title: Savory Chive Egg Toast with Yogurt and Fruit
directions: Toast the bread. Butter both slices lightly.
Beat eggs with a splash of milk, salt, pepper, and chopped chives.
Cook eggs over medium-low heat in butter, stirring gently for soft, fluffy curds.
Assemble savory toast: spoon scrambled eggs onto one slice of buttered toast. Drizzle with hot sauce.
Assemble sweet toast: spread fruit preserves on the second slice of buttered toast.
Prepare yogurt side: layer Greek yogurt with fruit and drizzle with honey.
notes: Split the toast into one savory slice and one sweet slice for contrast. Use vinegar-based hot sauce (Cholula, Crystal, or Tabasco) on the egg toast. Do not put eggs on top of fruit preserves - keep them separate. Optional upgrades: avocado slices under the eggs, cream cheese spread, rub a cut garlic clove on hot toast, everything bagel seasoning, or add granola/nuts/chia seeds to the yogurt.
